channel.title: [PI] How to Add "Chosse a Starter"
channel.description:
Im Currently trying to make an interface when you log in for the first time it gives you a choice to become
Mage, Range , Melee or Skiller.
How Could i do this ?
If you Know could you please reply or add me on skype : Zack.Havill

[/quote]u mad, right?

Why would I be mad? I’m just trying to say that there are MANY better ways of doing this.[/quote]
u mad haha just trolling

item.title: [PI] How to Add "Chosse a Starter"
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

I posted this on r-s like 6 months ago but it should work… Closest I can give you without doing everything for you lol.

DiagloueHandler:

case 69: sendOption4("Set here", "Set here", "Set here", "Set here"); dialogueAction = changethistodialogueaction; break;

Then just remove add starter in playerassistant. And make new methods for each of these options. Like so.

public void startOption1(Client c) { //put shit here c.getDH().sendDialogues(dialogueactionhere, c.npcType); }

Then in clicking buttons in 9178 add the first set

if (dialougueAction == dialogueactionhere) c.getPA().startOption1(c);

Then in clicking buttons in 9179 add the second set

if (dialougueAction == dialogueactionhere) c.getPA().startOption2(c);

Then in clicking buttons in 9180 add the third set

if (dialougueAction == dialogueactionhere) c.getPA().startOption3(c);

Then in clicking buttons in 9181 add the fourth set

if (dialougueAction == dialogueactionhere) c.getPA().startOption4(c);

Read full topic
